title: MY PING AND FPS IS FINE BUT LAGGING
body: My fps is 31-50 and my ping is 40-57 it might dont sound good but it is for me because i dont lag. I played a game and everything was moving soooo slow-motion and everything was delayed.

replies.body:
yoo,

I had the same problems. Switching from wifi to cable solved it for me

I removed this log due to sensitive information contained within it.  You should be able to upload logs yourself through the [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader).  If you run into any issues, just hit us up in a ticket so we can help through a more private venue.

Delays in game can still be caused by an unstable connection to the game server, even with solid ping.  You might instead be experiencing packet loss, so run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview and know for sure.  Let me know what you find.
My network log isn't in my league of legends folder!!

That's strange, are you on a different pc?  That's okay!  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to get some more context and hit us up directly through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We have a tech team who can help work with you individually on this.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!

SOOOO EMBARASSING I FOUND THE NETWORK LOG IT WAS IN THE LOG FOLDER ..idk how to work this out I click upload logs and I open up the log folder and theres a lot of logs but when I click the network log theres a lot of documents of it and idk which one to click
Honestly I'm not sure on this but I THINK I deleted it awhile back..and I'm on the pc I play league of legends on. And ok ty ill hit ya up
